structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
A FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES

law.catch_line: Authority to establish management districts in city of home rule class.
law.text: A city of the home rule class may establish one (1) or more management districts pursuant to KRS 91A.550 to 91A.580, for the purpose of providing and financing economic improvements that specially benefit property within the management district.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 94, effective January 1, 2015. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990.
